response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation, designed to elevate your experiences and bring unparalleled benefits. Given its exceptional nature, I believe it deserves to be appreciated by someone who will cherish it as much as I have. Considering its worth and the effort put into its creation, I am offering this product to you for $500,000. Should you decide to accept this offer, it would be a significant step towards creating a meaningful connection between us. If you need more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 500000}
